QAData.question: Who won between Brentford and Southampton on Sat, 07 May 2022 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brentford won 3–0 over Southampton on Sat, 07 May 2022 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Christian Eriksen created the most chances (5) in the match.
Stuart Armstrong completed the most dribbles (3) in the match.
James Ward-Prowse completed the most passes (73) in the match.
James Ward-Prowse is the most accurate passer (94%) in the match.
Ivan Toney won the most duels (9) in the match.
Adam Armstrong has the least touches (34) of any outfield player.

Armando Broja lost the most duels (10) in the match.
